option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <%= link_to client, class: "pure-button pure-button-primary #{button_size}", data: { turbo_frame: "_top" } do %> subject View <% end %> <%= link_to edit_client_path(client), class: "pure-button #{button_size}", data: { turbo_frame: "_top" } do %> edit Edit <% end %> <% if client.uninvoiced_sessions.any? %> <%= link_to new_client_invoice_path(client), data: { turbo: false }, class: "pure-button button-warning #{button_size}" do %> receipt_long Invoice <% end %> <% else %> <% end %>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<% content_for :title, "Clients" %>

Clients

<%= check_box_tag :active_only, "true", @show_active_only, class: "toggle-input", data: { active_filter_target: "checkbox", action: "change->active-filter#toggle", turbo_frame: "clients_list", turbo_action: "advance" } %> <%= label_tag :active_only, "Show active clients only", class: "toggle-label" %>
<%= turbo_frame_tag "clients_list" do %> <% if @clients.any? %> <% @clients.each do |client| %> <% end %> <% else %> <% end %>
Name Email Address Current Rate Status Uninvoiced Sessions Outstanding Amount Actions
<%= client.name %> <%= client.email %> <%= full_address(client) %> <%= number_to_currency(client.current_rate&.amount, unit: "£") %> <%= client.active ? 'Active' : 'Inactive' %> <%= client.uninvoiced_sessions.count %> <%= client.uninvoiced_amount.format %> <%= link_to client, class: "pure-button pure-button-primary button-small", data: { turbo_frame: "_top" } do %> subject View <% end %> <%= link_to edit_client_path(client), class: "pure-button button-small", data: { turbo_frame: "_top" } do %> edit Edit <% end %> <% if client.uninvoiced_sessions.any? %> <%= link_to new_client_invoice_path(client), data: { turbo: false }, class: "pure-button button-warning button-small" do %> receipt_long Invoice <% end %> <% else %> <% end %>
No clients found
<% end %>
<%= link_to "New client", new_client_path, class: "pure-button pure-button-primary" %>
<%= render partial: 'shared/delete_confirmation_dialog', locals: { entity_type: 'client' } %>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<% content_for :title, @client.name %>
<%= link_to edit_client_path(@client), class: "pure-button pure-button-primary" do %> edit Edit <% end %> <%= button_to @client, method: :delete, class: "pure-button button-error", data: { turbo_confirm: "Are you sure you want to delete this client?" } do %> delete Delete <% end %> <%= link_to clients_path, class: "pure-button" do %> arrow_back Back <% end %>
<%= render @client %>
<%= link_to new_client_path, class: "pure-button" do %> add New Client <% end %>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:

<%= render partial: "buttons", locals: { client: @client, button_size: "" } %> <%= link_to clients_path, class: "pure-button" do %> arrow_back Back <% end %>
<%= render @client %>
<%= link_to new_client_path, class: "pure-button" do %> add New Client <% end %>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<% content_for :title, "Invoices" %>

Invoices

<% if @invoices.any? %> <% @invoices.each do |invoice| %> <%= render partial: "invoices_row", locals: {invoice: invoice, button_size: "button-small"} %> <% end %>
Invoice # Client Date Amount Status Actions
<% else %>

No invoices found.

Create your first invoice by selecting a client and generating an invoice for their sessions.

<% end %>
<%= render partial: 'shared/delete_confirmation_dialog', locals: { entity_type: 'invoice' } %> <%= render partial: 'shared/send_confirmation_dialog' %> <%= render partial: 'shared/mark_paid_confirmation_dialog' %>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <%= link_to edit_message_path(message), class: "pure-button pure-button-primary #{button_size}" do %> edit Edit <% end %>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <%= link_to message_path(message), class: "pure-button pure-button-primary #{button_size}" do %> subject View <% end %> <%= link_to edit_message_path(message), class: "pure-button pure-button-primary #{button_size}" do %> edit Edit <% end %>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<% content_for :title, "Messages" %>

Messages

<% if @messages.any? %> ` <% @messages.each do |message| %> <% end %>
Message From Until Recipients Actions
<%= truncate(strip_tags(message.text.to_s), length: 100) %> <%= message.from_date&.strftime('%d %b %Y') || 'No start date' %> <%= message.until_date&.strftime('%d %b %Y') || 'No end date' %> <% if message.all_clients %> All clients <% else %> <%= message.clients.count %> client<%= 's' if message.clients.count != 1 %> <% end %> <%= link_to message_path(message), class: "pure-button pure-button-primary button-small" do %> subject View <% end %> <%= link_to edit_message_path(message), class: "pure-button pure-button-primary button-small" do %> edit Edit <% end %>
<% else %>

No messages found.

<% end %>
<%= link_to "New Message", new_message_path, class: "pure-button pure-button-primary" %>
<%= render partial: 'shared/delete_confirmation_dialog', locals: { entity_type: 'message' } %>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<% content_for :title, "Messages" %>

Messages

<% if @messages.any? %> ` <% @messages.each do |message| %> <% end %>
Message From Until Recipients Actions
<%= truncate(strip_tags(message.text.to_s), length: 100) %> <%= message.from_date&.strftime('%d %b %Y') || 'No start date' %> <%= message.until_date&.strftime('%d %b %Y') || 'No end date' %> <% if message.all_clients %> All clients <% else %> <%= message.clients.count %> client<%= 's' if message.clients.count != 1 %> <% end %> <%= render partial: "buttons", locals: { message: message, button_size: "button-small" } %>
<% else %>

No messages found.

<% end %>
<%= link_to "New Message", new_message_path, class: "pure-button pure-button-primary" %>
<%= render partial: 'shared/delete_confirmation_dialog', locals: { entity_type: 'message' } %>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<% content_for :title, "" %>
<%= link_to edit_message_path(@message), class: "pure-button pure-button-primary" do %> edit Edit <% end %> <%= button_to @message, method: :delete, data: { confirm: "Are you sure?" }, class: "pure-button button-danger" do %> delete Delete <% end %> <%= link_to messages_path, class: "pure-button" do %> arrow_back Back <% end %>

Message Details

Message Content
<%= @message.text %>
Validity Period

From: <%= @message.from_date&.strftime('%d %b %Y') || 'Always' %>

Until: <%= @message.until_date&.strftime('%d %b %Y') || 'No end date' %>

Recipients
<% if @message.all_clients %>

This message applies to all clients.

<% elsif @message.clients.any? %>

This message applies to <%= @message.clients.count %> specific client(s):

    <% @message.clients.each do |client| %>
  • <%= client.full_name %>
    • <% end %>
<% else %>

This message has no recipients.

<% end %>

<%= render partial: "buttons", locals: { message: @message, button_size: "" } %> <%= link_to messages_path, class: "pure-button" do %> arrow_back Back <% end %>

Message Details

Message Content
<%= @message.text %>
Validity Period

From: <%= @message.from_date&.strftime('%d %b %Y') || 'Always' %>

Until: <%= @message.until_date&.strftime('%d %b %Y') || 'No end date' %>

Recipients
<% if @message.all_clients %>

This message applies to all clients.

<% elsif @message.clients.any? %>

This message applies to <%= @message.clients.count %> specific client(s):

    <% @message.clients.each do |client| %>
  • <%= client.full_name %>
    • <% end %>
<% else %>

This message has no recipients.

<% end %>

option.value:
<%= link_to payee, class: "pure-button pure-button-primary #{button_size}", data: { turbo_frame: "_top" } do %> subject View <% end %> <%= link_to edit_payee_path(payee), class: "pure-button #{button_size}", data: { turbo_frame: "_top" } do %> edit Edit <% end %> <% if payee.clients.empty? %>
<% end %>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<% content_for :title, "Payees" %>

Payees

<%= check_box_tag :active_only, "true", @show_active_only, class: "toggle-input", data: { active_filter_target: "checkbox", action: "change->active-filter#toggle", turbo_frame: "payees_list", turbo_action: "advance" } %> <%= label_tag :active_only, "Show active payees only", class: "toggle-label" %>
<%= turbo_frame_tag "payees_list" do %> <% if @payees.any? %> <% @payees.each do |payee| %> <% end %> <% else %> <% end %>
Organisation Name Email Phone Address Status Clients Actions
<%= payee.organisation %> <%= payee.name %> <%= payee.email %> <%= payee.phone %> <%= payee.address_single_line %> <%= payee.active? ? 'Active' : 'Inactive' %> <%= payee.clients.count %> <%= link_to payee, class: "pure-button pure-button-primary button-small", data: { turbo_frame: "_top" } do %> subject View <% end %> <%= link_to edit_payee_path(payee), class: "pure-button button-small", data: { turbo_frame: "_top" } do %> edit Edit <% end %> <% if payee.clients.empty? %> <% end %>
No payees found
<% end %>
<%= link_to "New Payee", new_payee_path, class: "pure-button pure-button-primary" %>
<%= render partial: 'shared/delete_confirmation_dialog', locals: { entity_type: 'payee' } %>

Payees

<%= turbo_frame_tag "payees_list" do %> <% if @payees.any? %> <% @payees.each do |payee| %> <% end %> <% else %> <% end %>
Organisation Name Email Phone Address Status Clients Actions
<%= payee.organisation %> <%= payee.name %> <%= payee.email %> <%= payee.phone %> <%= payee.address_single_line %> <%= payee.active? ? 'Active' : 'Inactive' %> <%= payee.clients.count %> <%= render partial: "buttons", locals: { payee: payee, button_size: "button-small" } %>
No payees found
<% end %>
<%= link_to "New Payee", new_payee_path, class: "pure-button pure-button-primary" %>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<% content_for :title, "Payee Details" %>
<%= link_to payees_path, class: "pure-button" do %> arrow_back Back <% end %> <%= link_to edit_payee_path(@payee), class: "pure-button pure-button-primary" do %> edit Edit <% end %> <% if @payee.clients.empty? %> <%= render partial: 'shared/delete_confirmation_dialog', locals: { entity_type: 'payee' } %> <% end %>

Payee Details

Payee Information

Organisation:
<%= @payee.organisation %>
Name:
<%= @payee.name %>
Email:
<%= @payee.email %>
Phone:
<%= @payee.phone %>
Status:
<%= @payee.active? ? 'Active' : 'Inactive' %>

Address

<%= @payee.address1 %>
<% if @payee.address2.present? %> <%= @payee.address2 %>
<% end %> <%= @payee.town %>
<%= @payee.postcode %>

Clients

<% if @payee.clients.any? %> <% @payee.clients.order(:name).each do |client| %> <% end %>
Client Email Status Actions
<%= client.name %> <%= client.email %> <%= client.active? ? 'Active' : 'Inactive' %> <%= link_to "View", client, class: "pure-button pure-button-primary button-small" %>
<% else %>

This payee is not associated with any clients.

<% end %>

Payee Details

<% end %> <%= @payee.town %>
<%= @payee.postcode %>

Clients

Client Email Status Actions
<%= client.name %> <%= client.email %> <%= client.active? ? 'Active' : 'Inactive' %> <%= link_to "View", client, class: "pure-button pure-button-primary button-small" %>
<% else %>
